Meet  Eyal Keren 👋
VP of User Acquisition at Palta. He joined our team exactly a year ago, coming from one of the world’s leading betting and gaming companies.

Read on to learn more about Eyal's first year with Palta 👇 and follow #lifeatpalta #teampalta for more employee stories.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗮𝘃𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗽𝗽?
Palta's mission to empower health, and well-being and create a global impact for good is something that strongly resonates with me. 
I also get to work with amazing people from all our portfolio companies, so I can't pick a favourite. I love all of Palta's apps equally 😉  

𝗗𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗽𝘀𝘆𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗯𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰𝘀 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗲?
Of course!
Being relatable, creating interest and suggesting a call to action are all things that might help any introvert.

𝗖𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗹𝗱?
There is a lot here, but three main ones are: 
✔  Balancing profitability and growth 
✔  AI integration in different aspects of UA 
✔ Evolving measurement to unlock new opportunities

𝗗𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗹𝘆? 
𝗪𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗮 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗶𝗳 𝘀𝗼 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝘆?
Yes! I am fully remote and relocated with my family to Portugal 🇵🇹 almost a year ago, so I would not only consider it but recommend it 💚 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝗱 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮?
I have a long list of goals but the main one would be creating a growth mindset that drives business impact in our companies.

#growth #healthtech #ai #portugal #useracquisition #vp #team #employeeengagement #tech #startup

𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗹 𝘂𝗽 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗨𝗽𝘃𝗼𝘁𝗲 🚀

Zing Coach™   has just launched an #AI-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 and the best part? YOU have the exclusive opportunity to gain early access to this amazing feature for free!

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗯𝘆 𝗭𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵?
The Body Scan feature helps users understand their body beyond the numbers on the scale, giving them an in-depth look at other indicators like body fat percentage and lean mass index.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗲𝘅𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗹𝘆?
✔The Body Scan utilizes your smartphone camera and a full-body photo, ensuring a seamless experience. Zing Coach™ prioritises your privacy and safeguards your data at all times, so one can rest assured that your photos are instantly and permanently deleted. The app would only leverage acquired images for AI training if there is explicit user permission in place. The latter can be withdrawn at any given moment for your convenience.

✔ Zing Coach™ AI then leverages machine-learning models, trained on an extensive dataset of DEXA results and paired images, to process an uploaded photo.

✔️ Based on this analysis, Zing's machine learning accurately predicts your body fat mass, offering results comparable to DEXA scans—the gold standard in body scanning.

✔️In addition, the system calculates your lean mass index, fat mass index, and resting metabolic rate. It then generates a comprehensive report tailored to your unique needs, complete with personalised macronutrients and fitness plans.

✔️Last but not least, your Body Scan Report can then be connected to the Zing Coach™ app to unlock the full potential of this feature 💪 

Ready to give Zing’s Body Scan a try? 
Go ahead, share your feedback and support one of Palta's apps on Product Hunt 👇 

Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦  #ai #fitness #machinelearning #healthtech #bodytransformation

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
How do you build a product with soul in Health Tech? 🤔

Yesterday, I had the pleasure of attending a Health Tech meet-up in London focused on building and scaling products with soul. The event brought together a diverse range of speakers from industry-leading companies such as Huma, Too Good To Go, AVIE, Stride.VC, and Peanut App.

Here are some key takeaways that resonated with me:

🌱 Foster a deep connection with your community to build a product that truly resonates with their needs, aspirations, and values.
💡 Discover your unique niche and pursue excellence within it, consistently delivering exceptional value and impact.
🤝 Collaborate with industry experts and thought leaders to infuse your product with diverse perspectives, expertise, and insights, creating a truly holistic solution.
💼 Prioritise finding the perfect market fit early on, investing the time and effort needed to deeply understand your target audience's pain points, desires, and behaviours.
🚀 Embrace technology and AI as powerful tools to enhance human connection, empathy, and personalisation in your product, empowering users to achieve their health and wellness goals.

Attending this event reaffirmed my belief in the transformative power of Health Tech. It reminded me that building a product with soul goes beyond technology — it requires a deep understanding of people's needs and a commitment to creating meaningful impact in their lives.

Thank you Palta for organising such a great event!

#healthtech #innovation #startup #entrepreneurship #founders

Meet  Elizabeth K.  👋

She recently swapped buzzy New York City for London and joined one of Palta's portfolio companies Simple App earlier this year as the Chief of Staff. 

Read on to learn more about Elizabeth 👇 and follow #lifeatpalta #teampalta for more employee stories.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗦𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘?
Fitness and nutrition is something I’m passionate about. 
I work with a personal trainer and have had my own journey with nutrition / body image when I was younger. For me, food is an experience, it’s culture, it’s nourishment. 
It’s great to be at a company that is dedicated to helping people achieve their weight and health goals without pushing them towards unhealthy relationship choices with food 💜 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗿𝗼𝗹𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗖𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗳 𝗼𝗳 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗳𝗳 (𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗰𝘂𝘀 𝗮𝘁 𝗦𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘) ?
I think the role of Chief of Staff is really about how you can help the CEO make the company a better company - pushing leaders to set the right goals and unblocking teams from the obstacles in reaching those goals. 
Thus far, I’ve been working on fixing the planning system and process so that they’re centred around ambitious KPIs and prioritization.
I’ve also created a system for the company and team roadmaps to become interlinked and more transparent, so people understand how their work rolls up into our high level KPIs. 

𝗢𝗻𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝘃𝗲 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝘁 𝗰𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗴𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁’𝘀 𝗯𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗲𝘃𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗴𝗵𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗿?
One of my professors said it best - “𝙨𝙘𝙝𝙤𝙤𝙡 𝙞𝙨𝙣’𝙩 𝙖𝙗𝙤𝙪𝙩 𝙬𝙝𝙖𝙩 𝙮𝙤𝙪 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣, 𝙞𝙩’𝙨 𝙖𝙗𝙤𝙪𝙩 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙝𝙤𝙬 𝙩𝙤 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣”. I’ve had many different experiences in my career from investment banking to growth marketing to now Chief of Staff at Simple App, and the common thread has always been figuring out how to solve new problems. 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗸𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗯𝗲𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗯𝗮𝘀𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗨𝗞 ?
I appreciate that London 🇬🇧  is very international. 
I’ve become friends with people from all walks of life which is fun. I love that it’s easier to explore more of Europe from London than from New York 🇺🇸  (where I’m originally from). 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝗱 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗦𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘?
The most important thing I’d like to achieve is to foster a culture of ownership and excellence all while breaking down the silos between teams. 
At the end of the day, what makes or breaks a company are the people - we need to ensure that our people have the right mindset, rigor and love towards their work. 

#career #healthtech #chiefofstaff #startup #learning #nutrition #employeeexperience #womenintech

Meet  Eyal Keren 👋
VP of User Acquisition at Palta. He joined our team exactly a year ago, coming from one of the world’s leading betting and gaming companies.

Read on to learn more about Eyal's first year with Palta 👇 and follow #lifeatpalta #teampalta for more employee stories.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗮𝘃𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗽𝗽?
Palta's mission to empower health, and well-being and create a global impact for good is something that strongly resonates with me. 
I also get to work with amazing people from all our portfolio companies, so I can't pick a favourite. I love all of Palta's apps equally 😉  

𝗗𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗽𝘀𝘆𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗯𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰𝘀 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗲?
Of course!
Being relatable, creating interest and suggesting a call to action are all things that might help any introvert.

𝗖𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗹𝗱?
There is a lot here, but three main ones are: 
✔  Balancing profitability and growth 
✔  AI integration in different aspects of UA 
✔ Evolving measurement to unlock new opportunities

𝗗𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗹𝘆? 
𝗪𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗮 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗶𝗳 𝘀𝗼 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝘆?
Yes! I am fully remote and relocated with my family to Portugal 🇵🇹 almost a year ago, so I would not only consider it but recommend it 💚 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝗱 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮?
I have a long list of goals but the main one would be creating a growth mindset that drives business impact in our companies.

#growth #healthtech #ai #portugal #useracquisition #vp #team #employeeengagement #tech #startup

𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗹 𝘂𝗽 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗨𝗽𝘃𝗼𝘁𝗲 🚀

Zing Coach™   has just launched an #AI-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 and the best part? YOU have the exclusive opportunity to gain early access to this amazing feature for free!

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗯𝘆 𝗭𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵?
The Body Scan feature helps users understand their body beyond the numbers on the scale, giving them an in-depth look at other indicators like body fat percentage and lean mass index.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗲𝘅𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗹𝘆?
✔The Body Scan utilizes your smartphone camera and a full-body photo, ensuring a seamless experience. Zing Coach™ prioritises your privacy and safeguards your data at all times, so one can rest assured that your photos are instantly and permanently deleted. The app would only leverage acquired images for AI training if there is explicit user permission in place. The latter can be withdrawn at any given moment for your convenience.

✔ Zing Coach™ AI then leverages machine-learning models, trained on an extensive dataset of DEXA results and paired images, to process an uploaded photo.

✔️ Based on this analysis, Zing's machine learning accurately predicts your body fat mass, offering results comparable to DEXA scans—the gold standard in body scanning.

✔️In addition, the system calculates your lean mass index, fat mass index, and resting metabolic rate. It then generates a comprehensive report tailored to your unique needs, complete with personalised macronutrients and fitness plans.

✔️Last but not least, your Body Scan Report can then be connected to the Zing Coach™ app to unlock the full potential of this feature 💪 

Ready to give Zing’s Body Scan a try? 
Go ahead, share your feedback and support one of Palta's apps on Product Hunt 👇 

Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦  #ai #fitness #machinelearning #healthtech #bodytransformation

Thank you Meta for a chance to experience a day enriched with invaluable insights, an opportunity to connect with visionaries who share similar passions within the industry and foster a collective pursuit of growth. 
Special thanks to Yael Meirow  and Omer Esquira 💚 💜

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
How do you build a product with soul in Health Tech? 🤔

Yesterday, I had the pleasure of attending a Health Tech meet-up in London focused on building and scaling products with soul. The event brought together a diverse range of speakers from industry-leading companies such as Huma, Too Good To Go, AVIE, Stride.VC, and Peanut App.

Here are some key takeaways that resonated with me:

🌱 Foster a deep connection with your community to build a product that truly resonates with their needs, aspirations, and values.
💡 Discover your unique niche and pursue excellence within it, consistently delivering exceptional value and impact.
🤝 Collaborate with industry experts and thought leaders to infuse your product with diverse perspectives, expertise, and insights, creating a truly holistic solution.
💼 Prioritise finding the perfect market fit early on, investing the time and effort needed to deeply understand your target audience's pain points, desires, and behaviours.
🚀 Embrace technology and AI as powerful tools to enhance human connection, empathy, and personalisation in your product, empowering users to achieve their health and wellness goals.

Attending this event reaffirmed my belief in the transformative power of Health Tech. It reminded me that building a product with soul goes beyond technology — it requires a deep understanding of people's needs and a commitment to creating meaningful impact in their lives.

Thank you Palta for organising such a great event!

#healthtech #innovation #startup #entrepreneurship #founders

With global VC funding falling dramatically since the beginning of ‘23, it’s a trying time for many tech startups compared to the recent heyday. Many, however, are still securing funds and mentorship.

On June 6th 🗓 we will meet again to learn from some truly inspiring tech businesses regarding their growth journeys.
Read on 👇 to learn more about our amazing lineup and sign up here 👉 https://lnkd.in/eVunK5dc

🛒 Too Good To Go has been on a mission to 𝗣𝘂𝘁 𝗮𝗻 𝗘𝗻𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗙𝗼𝗼𝗱 𝗪𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗲 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱𝘄𝗶𝗱𝗲 since 2015. Its mobile app conveniently connects customers to restaurants and stores that have surplus unsold food. The service covers major European cities, and after almost 5 years in business, it successfully expanded its operations to North America.

🥜 Peanut App is a safe space for women navigating fertility, pregnancy, motherhood or menopause. The Peanut App has rightfully become the place where many find much needed support and connection with each other - whether via a local yoga group or an international discussion thread.

⏳ Only last month, the Fit-Tech startup Avie (acquired by Holland & Barrett) was snapped up by the High Street giant - Holland & Barrett, as the retailer looks to provide customized wellness solutions to its customers. As part of the acquisition, the startup founders will join the 𝗛&𝗕 𝗪𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗙𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺 to build Avie’s technology into Holland & Barrett’s digital services and solutions.

🏥 Huma leads digital-first patient care with '𝗵𝗼𝘀𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗮𝘁 𝗵𝗼𝗺𝗲' technology. It collects real-world patient data remotely to effectively connect people and clinical teams for use in preventative healthcare. Huma hits two birds with one stone, enabling greater access to care from any location and improving efficiency for clinicians.

Ready to learn and network? We will see you at 🌿 𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗔 𝗦𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗹𝗱𝘀 🌿 next week.

Meet  Elizabeth K.  👋

She recently swapped buzzy New York City for London and joined one of Palta's portfolio companies Simple App earlier this year as the Chief of Staff. 

Read on to learn more about Elizabeth 👇 and follow #lifeatpalta #teampalta for more employee stories.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗦𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘?
Fitness and nutrition is something I’m passionate about. 
I work with a personal trainer and have had my own journey with nutrition / body image when I was younger. For me, food is an experience, it’s culture, it’s nourishment. 
It’s great to be at a company that is dedicated to helping people achieve their weight and health goals without pushing them towards unhealthy relationship choices with food 💜 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗿𝗼𝗹𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗖𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗳 𝗼𝗳 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗳𝗳 (𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗰𝘂𝘀 𝗮𝘁 𝗦𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘) ?
I think the role of Chief of Staff is really about how you can help the CEO make the company a better company - pushing leaders to set the right goals and unblocking teams from the obstacles in reaching those goals. 
Thus far, I’ve been working on fixing the planning system and process so that they’re centred around ambitious KPIs and prioritization.
I’ve also created a system for the company and team roadmaps to become interlinked and more transparent, so people understand how their work rolls up into our high level KPIs. 

𝗢𝗻𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝘃𝗲 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝘁 𝗰𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗴𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁’𝘀 𝗯𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗲𝘃𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗴𝗵𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗿?
One of my professors said it best - “𝙨𝙘𝙝𝙤𝙤𝙡 𝙞𝙨𝙣’𝙩 𝙖𝙗𝙤𝙪𝙩 𝙬𝙝𝙖𝙩 𝙮𝙤𝙪 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣, 𝙞𝙩’𝙨 𝙖𝙗𝙤𝙪𝙩 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙝𝙤𝙬 𝙩𝙤 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣”. I’ve had many different experiences in my career from investment banking to growth marketing to now Chief of Staff at Simple App, and the common thread has always been figuring out how to solve new problems. 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗸𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗯𝗲𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗯𝗮𝘀𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗨𝗞 ?
I appreciate that London 🇬🇧  is very international. 
I’ve become friends with people from all walks of life which is fun. I love that it’s easier to explore more of Europe from London than from New York 🇺🇸  (where I’m originally from). 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝗱 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗦𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘?
The most important thing I’d like to achieve is to foster a culture of ownership and excellence all while breaking down the silos between teams. 
At the end of the day, what makes or breaks a company are the people - we need to ensure that our people have the right mindset, rigor and love towards their work. 

#career #healthtech #chiefofstaff #startup #learning #nutrition #employeeexperience #womenintech

Our team at Simple App has been busy cooking a whole new product recipe with the most sought ingredient - #AI 
The result is SIMPLY outstanding. Meet 𝗔𝘃𝗼 🥑 an 𝗔𝗜-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗰𝗵𝗮𝘁𝗯𝗼𝘁 🤖  that answers users’ questions in real-time, giving the information they need to keep moving toward their health and nutrition goals, right there in the Simple App.

𝗔𝘃𝗼 is just a click away all those times when you are curious to learn:

💡 Which food choices best align with your health objectives

Our FitTech Club podcast is finally live! 🔥

I met Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦 in the new office of Zing Coach™ in Limassol, Cyprus, to speak about her personal story and vision of the industry. 

After leaving her home country, Belarus, Tanya had to start all over again. Today, her fitness training app Zing Coach™ reaches 500,000 users. As the stakes are getting higher, Tanya reflects on her past mistakes and learnings – and predicts where her future competitors will come from.

Tune in! 🎙️ https://lnkd.in/gjMrHhkh

#podcast #fittech #fitnesstech #founderstories

company_updates_collection.description:
Meet  Eyal Keren 👋
VP of User Acquisition at Palta. He joined our team exactly a year ago, coming from one of the world’s leading betting and gaming companies.

Read on to learn more about Eyal's first year with Palta 👇 and follow #lifeatpalta #teampalta for more employee stories.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗮𝘃𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗽𝗽?
Palta's mission to empower health, and well-being and create a global impact for good is something that strongly resonates with me. 
I also get to work with amazing people from all our portfolio companies, so I can't pick a favourite. I love all of Palta's apps equally 😉  

𝗗𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗽𝘀𝘆𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗯𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰𝘀 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗲?
Of course!
Being relatable, creating interest and suggesting a call to action are all things that might help any introvert.

𝗖𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗹𝗱?
There is a lot here, but three main ones are: 
✔  Balancing profitability and growth 
✔  AI integration in different aspects of UA 
✔ Evolving measurement to unlock new opportunities

𝗗𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗹𝘆? 
𝗪𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗮 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗶𝗳 𝘀𝗼 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝘆?
Yes! I am fully remote and relocated with my family to Portugal 🇵🇹 almost a year ago, so I would not only consider it but recommend it 💚 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝗱 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮?
I have a long list of goals but the main one would be creating a growth mindset that drives business impact in our companies.

#growth #healthtech #ai #portugal #useracquisition #vp #team #employeeengagement #tech #startup

𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗹 𝘂𝗽 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗨𝗽𝘃𝗼𝘁𝗲 🚀

Zing Coach™   has just launched an #AI-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 and the best part? YOU have the exclusive opportunity to gain early access to this amazing feature for free!

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗯𝘆 𝗭𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵?
The Body Scan feature helps users understand their body beyond the numbers on the scale, giving them an in-depth look at other indicators like body fat percentage and lean mass index.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗲𝘅𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗹𝘆?
✔The Body Scan utilizes your smartphone camera and a full-body photo, ensuring a seamless experience. Zing Coach™ prioritises your privacy and safeguards your data at all times, so one can rest assured that your photos are instantly and permanently deleted. The app would only leverage acquired images for AI training if there is explicit user permission in place. The latter can be withdrawn at any given moment for your convenience.

✔ Zing Coach™ AI then leverages machine-learning models, trained on an extensive dataset of DEXA results and paired images, to process an uploaded photo.

✔️ Based on this analysis, Zing's machine learning accurately predicts your body fat mass, offering results comparable to DEXA scans—the gold standard in body scanning.

✔️In addition, the system calculates your lean mass index, fat mass index, and resting metabolic rate. It then generates a comprehensive report tailored to your unique needs, complete with personalised macronutrients and fitness plans.

✔️Last but not least, your Body Scan Report can then be connected to the Zing Coach™ app to unlock the full potential of this feature 💪 

Ready to give Zing’s Body Scan a try? 
Go ahead, share your feedback and support one of Palta's apps on Product Hunt 👇 

Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦  #ai #fitness #machinelearning #healthtech #bodytransformation

Our team at Palta was beyond thrilled to catch a glimpse of Simple App's Dmitrii Ablov (UA Director) and Ivan Semin (VP of Marketing) rocking the stage at Meta's 𝗙𝘂𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗹𝘀 𝗙𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗮𝗹: 𝗔𝗽𝗽𝘀 𝗗𝗮𝘆 in the 💚 of Tel Aviv.

The guys headlined an afternoon fireside chat discussion on the topic of fuelling conversions and supercharging growth 📈 

Thank you Meta for a chance to experience a day enriched with invaluable insights, an opportunity to connect with visionaries who share similar passions within the industry and foster a collective pursuit of growth. 
Special thanks to Yael Meirow  and Omer Esquira 💚 💜 

 #growth #techcommunity  #marketing #startups #healthtech #appdevelopment #telaviv

New Scientist magazine has recently published an in-depth piece, looking into a rocketing number of cases of 𝗔𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗗𝗲𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝘁 𝗛𝘆𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗼𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗿 (𝗔𝗗𝗛𝗗).
What non-medical treatments and management tactics are available out there, and how can you get in the driver's seat and take full ownership of your attention budget? 
Palta's Chief Medical Advisor, Andrew Belaveshkin MD PhD shares a few recommendations 👇 
#adhdawareness #adhdsupport #healthtech #wellbeing
💚 you are very welcome 💚
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: Medical Doctor | KCL & Imperial College London | Co-Founder of Medtechly
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
How do you build a product with soul in Health Tech? 🤔

Yesterday, I had the pleasure of attending a Health Tech meet-up in London focused on building and scaling products with soul. The event brought together a diverse range of speakers from industry-leading companies such as Huma, Too Good To Go, AVIE, Stride.VC, and Peanut App.

Here are some key takeaways that resonated with me:

🌱 Foster a deep connection with your community to build a product that truly resonates with their needs, aspirations, and values.
💡 Discover your unique niche and pursue excellence within it, consistently delivering exceptional value and impact.
🤝 Collaborate with industry experts and thought leaders to infuse your product with diverse perspectives, expertise, and insights, creating a truly holistic solution.
💼 Prioritise finding the perfect market fit early on, investing the time and effort needed to deeply understand your target audience's pain points, desires, and behaviours.
🚀 Embrace technology and AI as powerful tools to enhance human connection, empathy, and personalisation in your product, empowering users to achieve their health and wellness goals.

Attending this event reaffirmed my belief in the transformative power of Health Tech. It reminded me that building a product with soul goes beyond technology — it requires a deep understanding of people's needs and a commitment to creating meaningful impact in their lives.

Thank you Palta for organising such a great event!

#healthtech #innovation #startup #entrepreneurship #founders

Earlier this year, Palta had the privilege of having Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦, one of our co-founders and the CEO of Zing Coach™, invited to participate in this transformative event. 
Read on to learn more about Tanya's experience 👇 
#tech #femalefounders  #healthtech #productdevelopment #startup #app #fitness

With global VC funding falling dramatically since the beginning of ‘23, it’s a trying time for many tech startups compared to the recent heyday. Many, however, are still securing funds and mentorship.

On June 6th 🗓 we will meet again to learn from some truly inspiring tech businesses regarding their growth journeys.
Read on 👇 to learn more about our amazing lineup and sign up here 👉 https://lnkd.in/eVunK5dc

🛒 Too Good To Go has been on a mission to 𝗣𝘂𝘁 𝗮𝗻 𝗘𝗻𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗙𝗼𝗼𝗱 𝗪𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗲 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱𝘄𝗶𝗱𝗲 since 2015. Its mobile app conveniently connects customers to restaurants and stores that have surplus unsold food. The service covers major European cities, and after almost 5 years in business, it successfully expanded its operations to North America.

🥜 Peanut App is a safe space for women navigating fertility, pregnancy, motherhood or menopause. The Peanut App has rightfully become the place where many find much needed support and connection with each other - whether via a local yoga group or an international discussion thread.

⏳ Only last month, the Fit-Tech startup Avie (acquired by Holland & Barrett) was snapped up by the High Street giant - Holland & Barrett, as the retailer looks to provide customized wellness solutions to its customers. As part of the acquisition, the startup founders will join the 𝗛&𝗕 𝗪𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗙𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺 to build Avie’s technology into Holland & Barrett’s digital services and solutions.

🏥 Huma leads digital-first patient care with '𝗵𝗼𝘀𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗮𝘁 𝗵𝗼𝗺𝗲' technology. It collects real-world patient data remotely to effectively connect people and clinical teams for use in preventative healthcare. Huma hits two birds with one stone, enabling greater access to care from any location and improving efficiency for clinicians.

Ready to learn and network? We will see you at 🌿 𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗔 𝗦𝗽𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗹𝗱𝘀 🌿 next week.

#growth #technology #digital #startup #healthtech #london #londonevents #scaleup #vcfunding #productdevelopment

𝗗𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗹𝘆?

Yes! I am fully remote and relocated with my family to Portugal 🇵🇹 almost a year ago, so I would not only consider it but recommend it 💚 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝗱 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮?
I have a long list of goals but the main one would be creating a growth mindset that drives business impact in our companies.

#growth #healthtech #ai #portugal #useracquisition #vp #team #employeeengagement #tech #startup

𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗹 𝘂𝗽 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗨𝗽𝘃𝗼𝘁𝗲 🚀

Zing Coach™   has just launched an #AI-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 and the best part? YOU have the exclusive opportunity to gain early access to this amazing feature for free!

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗯𝘆 𝗭𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵?
The Body Scan feature helps users understand their body beyond the numbers on the scale, giving them an in-depth look at other indicators like body fat percentage and lean mass index.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗲𝘅𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗹𝘆?
✔The Body Scan utilizes your smartphone camera and a full-body photo, ensuring a seamless experience. Zing Coach™ prioritises your privacy and safeguards your data at all times, so one can rest assured that your photos are instantly and permanently deleted. The app would only leverage acquired images for AI training if there is explicit user permission in place. The latter can be withdrawn at any given moment for your convenience.

✔ Zing Coach™ AI then leverages machine-learning models, trained on an extensive dataset of DEXA results and paired images, to process an uploaded photo.

✔️ Based on this analysis, Zing's machine learning accurately predicts your body fat mass, offering results comparable to DEXA scans—the gold standard in body scanning.

✔️In addition, the system calculates your lean mass index, fat mass index, and resting metabolic rate. It then generates a comprehensive report tailored to your unique needs, complete with personalised macronutrients and fitness plans.

✔️Last but not least, your Body Scan Report can then be connected to the Zing Coach™ app to unlock the full potential of this feature 💪 

Ready to give Zing’s Body Scan a try? 
Go ahead, share your feedback and support one of Palta's apps on Product Hunt 👇 

Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦  #ai #fitness #machinelearning #healthtech #bodytransformation

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: Medical Doctor | KCL & Imperial College London | Co-Founder of Medtechly
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
How do you build a product with soul in Health Tech? 🤔

Yesterday, I had the pleasure of attending a Health Tech meet-up in London focused on building and scaling products with soul. The event brought together a diverse range of speakers from industry-leading companies such as Huma, Too Good To Go, AVIE, Stride.VC, and Peanut App.

Here are some key takeaways that resonated with me:

🌱 Foster a deep connection with your community to build a product that truly resonates with their needs, aspirations, and values.
💡 Discover your unique niche and pursue excellence within it, consistently delivering exceptional value and impact.
🤝 Collaborate with industry experts and thought leaders to infuse your product with diverse perspectives, expertise, and insights, creating a truly holistic solution.
💼 Prioritise finding the perfect market fit early on, investing the time and effort needed to deeply understand your target audience's pain points, desires, and behaviours.
🚀 Embrace technology and AI as powerful tools to enhance human connection, empathy, and personalisation in your product, empowering users to achieve their health and wellness goals.

Attending this event reaffirmed my belief in the transformative power of Health Tech. It reminded me that building a product with soul goes beyond technology — it requires a deep understanding of people's needs and a commitment to creating meaningful impact in their lives.

Thank you Palta for organising such a great event!

#healthtech #innovation #startup #entrepreneurship #founders

Another epic update from the team at Simple App, who’ve been hard at work at the coalface of cutting-edge tech, designing an updated Food Tracker, a system that Scores their users’ meals’ nutrient value, AND an updated Home screen — talk about busy!
These new features will remove a lot of confusion and frustration from users’ lives — no more scratching their heads wondering if a meal was helpful or healthy for their goals. Now all they need to do is eat, log, and learn from the food feedback they get.
Logging food with SIMPLE is now easier and more intuitive. Instead of scrolling a food database, users can just type in what they ate, snap a photo of their meal, or describe it using their voice.
Once a user has logged their food, it’s analyzed by the Nutrition Scores system which the Simple App science team has infused with #nutrition knowledge and designed to reflect well-established nutrition guidelines. The user then gets a (judgment-free) Nutrition Score of Low, Fair, Good, or Optimal which shows the overall nutrition quality of their meal.
That’s a game-changer, right there 👏🏻:

Any time a user feels stuck on what to do next, one glance at their Simple Home screen will point them in the right direction of what to do today, and where they’re at with their overall day’s Nutrition Score and within their fasting schedule.
These outstanding new features are another brick in the wall of Simple App’s vision to make improved health accessible to all. Learn more about them here: 👇🏻
Nice work team!!


#ai #nutrition #objectives #healthylifestyle #productdevelopment #productdesign #userexperience #wellness
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
Our users wanted us to make our food tracking system better. So we listened and got to work. Incorporating AI into our already-smart #tech is changing the game for how we support our users, and we’re super excited to share some new features with you today!  

🍏🥐🍅 INTRODUCING … our new and improved Food Tracker 

Logging food with SIMPLE is now easier, more intuitive, and quick as a flash. Instead of scrolling a food database, users can just type in what they ate, snap a photo of their meal, or describe it using their voice. 

We’re stoked with this update. But what comes next is even BETTER. 

🟢🟠🟡 INTRODUCING … our new Nutrition Scores and food feedback 

Once a user has logged their food, it’s analyzed by our algorithm, which has been designed alongside our in-house science team to reflect well-established #nutrition guidelines. Each food is assessed in terms of nutritional factors that influence weight and health to give the user a Nutrition Score of Low, Fair, Good, or Optimal. This shows the overall nutritional quality of their meal. They can also see a daily Score, which is the average of all meal Scores logged that day. 

We designed Nutrition Scores based on our belief that no food is either “good” or “bad.” These Scores don’t judge our users or their food choices. They’re designed to guide — not guilt — them toward a healthier, more balanced diet over time, bringing their goals even more within reach. #nutritionmatters

📲 INTRODUCING … our redesigned Home screen that guides users on what to do today, saving them time, and confusion, and smoothing out the bumpy road of building new habits. 

Now when users tap open their app, they have these key features in one place: 
📲 the day’s average Nutrition Score and logged meals
📲 a button to log new meals (and edit previously logged meals)
📲 where they are in their eating or fasting window
📲 buttons to start or stop their fast or change their daily intermittent fasting schedule 

🥑 DON’T FORGET … Avo, our recently launched AI-powered nutrition chatbot

A final shout-out to Avo, who’s on hand 24/7 to answer your wellness questions! Avo’s now living its best life in the SIMPLE app, helping users zhuzh up their meals, feel more relaxed when stress-eating flares up, and stay motivated on their weight loss journey.

Launching these brand-new features in our SIMPLE app feels like Christmas Day: we can’t wait for our users’ to try them! We keep moving closer to our vision of making improved health accessible to all, working day by day on our mission of translating cutting-edge nutritional science and tech into simple, everyday solutions. 

The Food Tracker and Nutrition Scores are already available to all our English users, but the Home screen updates are currently only available in the English iOS version of the app. More languages (French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Spanish) and Android are coming soon! 

👉 https://lnkd.in/dCtF9UwP

Our FitTech Club podcast is finally live! 🔥

I met Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦 in the new office of Zing Coach™ in Limassol, Cyprus, to speak about her personal story and vision of the industry. 

After leaving her home country, Belarus, Tanya had to start all over again. Today, her fitness training app Zing Coach™ reaches 500,000 users. As the stakes are getting higher, Tanya reflects on her past mistakes and learnings – and predicts where her future competitors will come from.

Tune in! 🎙️ https://lnkd.in/gjMrHhkh

#podcast #fittech #fitnesstech #founderstories

Meet Georgia Kampanelli, Legal Counsel at Palta, whom Gold Magazine recently interviewed.

🔵 She didn't initially envision herself working in a tech company. But her career journey has been one of embracing change and seizing new opportunities.

🔄 Switching Sectors: Georgia transitioned from a traditional law firm to the private banking sector before ultimately landing in the tech industry. This decision wasn't easy, but it was fueled by her attraction to innovation and entrepreneurial spirit.

🔮 Future-focused: Georgia is optimistic about the tech sector's future, especially after its resilience during challenging times. Being in-house counsel in tech is not just about legalities; it's about understanding the big picture and adapting to constant changes in business and global contexts.

🛠️ Skill Set: Beyond legal advice, in-house roles require project management skills and effective communication with various stakeholders—from management to marketing.

🤖 Tech-Savvy Legal Operations: At Palta, Georgia highlights the increasing role of generative AI tools and automated processes in legal operations. She advocates for lawyers to be educated in legal technology as the industry evolves.

🌍 Staying Informed: With the fast-paced nature of tech, Georgia stresses the importance of staying updated from trusted sources on both local and global scales.

🚀 "You can observe the next generation, but it is way more fascinating to be a part of it!" - Georgia Kampanelli

Our FitTech Club podcast is finally live! 🔥

I met Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦 in the new office of Zing Coach™ in Limassol, Cyprus, to speak about her personal story and vision of the industry.

The result is SIMPLY outstanding. Meet 𝗔𝘃𝗼 🥑 an 𝗔𝗜-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗰𝗵𝗮𝘁𝗯𝗼𝘁 🤖  that answers users’ questions in real-time, giving the information they need to keep moving toward their health and nutrition goals, right there in the Simple App.

Meet  Eyal Keren 👋
VP of User Acquisition at Palta. He joined our team exactly a year ago, coming from one of the world’s leading betting and gaming companies.

Read on to learn more about Eyal's first year with Palta 👇 and follow #lifeatpalta #teampalta for more employee stories.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗮𝘃𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗽𝗽?
Palta's mission to empower health, and well-being and create a global impact for good is something that strongly resonates with me. 
I also get to work with amazing people from all our portfolio companies, so I can't pick a favourite. I love all of Palta's apps equally 😉  

𝗗𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗽𝘀𝘆𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗯𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰𝘀 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗲?
Of course!
Being relatable, creating interest and suggesting a call to action are all things that might help any introvert.

𝗖𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗹𝗱?
There is a lot here, but three main ones are: 
✔  Balancing profitability and growth 
✔  AI integration in different aspects of UA 
✔ Evolving measurement to unlock new opportunities

𝗗𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗹𝘆? 
𝗪𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗮 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗶𝗳 𝘀𝗼 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝘆?
Yes! I am fully remote and relocated with my family to Portugal 🇵🇹 almost a year ago, so I would not only consider it but recommend it 💚 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝗱 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮?
I have a long list of goals but the main one would be creating a growth mindset that drives business impact in our companies.

#growth #healthtech #ai #portugal #useracquisition #vp #team #employeeengagement #tech #startup

𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗹 𝘂𝗽 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗨𝗽𝘃𝗼𝘁𝗲 🚀

Zing Coach™   has just launched an #AI-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 and the best part? YOU have the exclusive opportunity to gain early access to this amazing feature for free!

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗼𝗱𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗯𝘆 𝗭𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵?
The Body Scan feature helps users understand their body beyond the numbers on the scale, giving them an in-depth look at other indicators like body fat percentage and lean mass index.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗲𝘅𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗹𝘆?
✔The Body Scan utilizes your smartphone camera and a full-body photo, ensuring a seamless experience. Zing Coach™ prioritises your privacy and safeguards your data at all times, so one can rest assured that your photos are instantly and permanently deleted. The app would only leverage acquired images for AI training if there is explicit user permission in place. The latter can be withdrawn at any given moment for your convenience.

✔ Zing Coach™ AI then leverages machine-learning models, trained on an extensive dataset of DEXA results and paired images, to process an uploaded photo.

✔️ Based on this analysis, Zing's machine learning accurately predicts your body fat mass, offering results comparable to DEXA scans—the gold standard in body scanning.

✔️In addition, the system calculates your lean mass index, fat mass index, and resting metabolic rate. It then generates a comprehensive report tailored to your unique needs, complete with personalised macronutrients and fitness plans.

✔️Last but not least, your Body Scan Report can then be connected to the Zing Coach™ app to unlock the full potential of this feature 💪 

Ready to give Zing’s Body Scan a try? 
Go ahead, share your feedback and support one of Palta's apps on Product Hunt 👇 

Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦  #ai #fitness #machinelearning #healthtech #bodytransformation

New Scientist magazine has recently published an in-depth piece, looking into a rocketing number of cases of 𝗔𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗗𝗲𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝘁 𝗛𝘆𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗼𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗿 (𝗔𝗗𝗛𝗗).
What non-medical treatments and management tactics are available out there, and how can you get in the driver's seat and take full ownership of your attention budget? 
Palta's Chief Medical Advisor, Andrew Belaveshkin MD PhD shares a few recommendations 👇 
#adhdawareness #adhdsupport #healthtech #wellbeing
💚 you are very welcome 💚
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: Medical Doctor | KCL & Imperial College London | Co-Founder of Medtechly
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
How do you build a product with soul in Health Tech? 🤔

Yesterday, I had the pleasure of attending a Health Tech meet-up in London focused on building and scaling products with soul. The event brought together a diverse range of speakers from industry-leading companies such as Huma, Too Good To Go, AVIE, Stride.VC, and Peanut App.

Here are some key takeaways that resonated with me:

🌱 Foster a deep connection with your community to build a product that truly resonates with their needs, aspirations, and values.
💡 Discover your unique niche and pursue excellence within it, consistently delivering exceptional value and impact.
🤝 Collaborate with industry experts and thought leaders to infuse your product with diverse perspectives, expertise, and insights, creating a truly holistic solution.
💼 Prioritise finding the perfect market fit early on, investing the time and effort needed to deeply understand your target audience's pain points, desires, and behaviours.
🚀 Embrace technology and AI as powerful tools to enhance human connection, empathy, and personalisation in your product, empowering users to achieve their health and wellness goals.

Attending this event reaffirmed my belief in the transformative power of Health Tech. It reminded me that building a product with soul goes beyond technology — it requires a deep understanding of people's needs and a commitment to creating meaningful impact in their lives.

Thank you Palta for organising such a great event!

#healthtech #innovation #startup #entrepreneurship #founders

company_updates_collection.description:
Tonight 🗓 Our final event before we break up for summer 🌴 

🛒 Jamie Crummie, Co-founder and Director Too Good To Go
🥜 Michelle Kennedy, Founder & CEO Peanut App
⏳ Charlie Leggate, Co-founder & CEO Avie (acquired by Holland & Barrett)
📱 Kit Logan, Co-founder Avie (acquired by Holland & Barrett)

will share their secrets for success and offer valuable insights on the art of scaling tech products with powerful missions.

It's not too late to RSVP 👇 
#growth #event #purposedriven #london #londonevents #productdevelopment

Another epic update from the team at Simple App, who’ve been hard at work at the coalface of cutting-edge tech, designing an updated Food Tracker, a system that Scores their users’ meals’ nutrient value, AND an updated Home screen — talk about busy!
These new features will remove a lot of confusion and frustration from users’ lives — no more scratching their heads wondering if a meal was helpful or healthy for their goals. Now all they need to do is eat, log, and learn from the food feedback they get.
Logging food with SIMPLE is now easier and more intuitive. Instead of scrolling a food database, users can just type in what they ate, snap a photo of their meal, or describe it using their voice.
Once a user has logged their food, it’s analyzed by the Nutrition Scores system which the Simple App science team has infused with #nutrition knowledge and designed to reflect well-established nutrition guidelines. The user then gets a (judgment-free) Nutrition Score of Low, Fair, Good, or Optimal which shows the overall nutrition quality of their meal.
That’s a game-changer, right there 👏🏻:

Any time a user feels stuck on what to do next, one glance at their Simple Home screen will point them in the right direction of what to do today, and where they’re at with their overall day’s Nutrition Score and within their fasting schedule.
These outstanding new features are another brick in the wall of Simple App’s vision to make improved health accessible to all. Learn more about them here: 👇🏻
Nice work team!!


#ai #nutrition #objectives #healthylifestyle #productdevelopment #productdesign #userexperience #wellness
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
Our users wanted us to make our food tracking system better. So we listened and got to work. Incorporating AI into our already-smart #tech is changing the game for how we support our users, and we’re super excited to share some new features with you today!  

🍏🥐🍅 INTRODUCING … our new and improved Food Tracker 

Logging food with SIMPLE is now easier, more intuitive, and quick as a flash. Instead of scrolling a food database, users can just type in what they ate, snap a photo of their meal, or describe it using their voice. 

We’re stoked with this update. But what comes next is even BETTER. 

🟢🟠🟡 INTRODUCING … our new Nutrition Scores and food feedback 

Once a user has logged their food, it’s analyzed by our algorithm, which has been designed alongside our in-house science team to reflect well-established #nutrition guidelines. Each food is assessed in terms of nutritional factors that influence weight and health to give the user a Nutrition Score of Low, Fair, Good, or Optimal. This shows the overall nutritional quality of their meal. They can also see a daily Score, which is the average of all meal Scores logged that day. 

We designed Nutrition Scores based on our belief that no food is either “good” or “bad.” These Scores don’t judge our users or their food choices. They’re designed to guide — not guilt — them toward a healthier, more balanced diet over time, bringing their goals even more within reach. #nutritionmatters

📲 INTRODUCING … our redesigned Home screen that guides users on what to do today, saving them time, and confusion, and smoothing out the bumpy road of building new habits. 

Now when users tap open their app, they have these key features in one place: 
📲 the day’s average Nutrition Score and logged meals
📲 a button to log new meals (and edit previously logged meals)
📲 where they are in their eating or fasting window
📲 buttons to start or stop their fast or change their daily intermittent fasting schedule 

🥑 DON’T FORGET … Avo, our recently launched AI-powered nutrition chatbot

A final shout-out to Avo, who’s on hand 24/7 to answer your wellness questions! Avo’s now living its best life in the SIMPLE app, helping users zhuzh up their meals, feel more relaxed when stress-eating flares up, and stay motivated on their weight loss journey.

Launching these brand-new features in our SIMPLE app feels like Christmas Day: we can’t wait for our users’ to try them! We keep moving closer to our vision of making improved health accessible to all, working day by day on our mission of translating cutting-edge nutritional science and tech into simple, everyday solutions. 

The Food Tracker and Nutrition Scores are already available to all our English users, but the Home screen updates are currently only available in the English iOS version of the app. More languages (French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Spanish) and Android are coming soon! 

👉 https://lnkd.in/dCtF9UwP

Wow! What an experience it was in Dallas, Texas for Obesity Week! It was my first time at this conference and I have to say it’s one of the best conferences I’ve been to.

The perfect platform to share the story of the Simple App, the research we do and our grand ambitions, in addition to presenting our second conference abstract.

With travelling solo and not knowing many people at the conference, a special thanks must go to the Allurion Technologies team Paul Sacher (PhD) Jen Pain Bill Nadeau, MS, RD Jeff Feldgoise  for adopting me, entertaining me and introducing me to so many amazing people. 

I’ve got some digesting to do, thinking about how we can apply the many fascinating concepts discussed into the future development of Simple 💫 

Great to see / meet Giles Yeo Elanor Hinton Volkan Demirhan Yumuk Katie Ellison, MS, RDN, LDN Sean Wharton Diana Thomas M. Christopher Griffith, M.D. Camilla Easter Professor Hutan Ashrafian Terese Torstensson Caterina Conte and many more! 💫

Today marks the official launch of Flo for Partners, the #1 most requested feature by Flo’s 58 million monthly active users.

As the world's leading women's health app, Flo’s mission is to create a better future for female health. With Flo for Partners, we are expanding our commitment to revolutionizing women's health by offering science-backed insights to couples seeking to improve their sex life, increase their chances of conceiving, or share their pregnancy journey. 

Our recent survey of nearly 2k American men found that over half feel that their sex education during adolescence was insufficient, and one-third report that insufficient sex education has led to unrealistic expectations and difficulty in communicating about sex. 

Flo for Partners addresses this knowledge gap head-on by providing medical insights, authored and vetted by Flo's team of over 120+ medical experts, and proactive tips to the partner's app. These insights and tips aim to enhance the partner's ability to support and understand their female partner, both physically and emotionally. 

As of today, Flo for Partners is available on both iOS and Android platforms. Follow the link to find out more about Flo for Partners: https://lnkd.in/eKMxXp-a

And we are excited to host Yuri Gurski and Alexander Chekan from Palta for a Q&A session with them at our event.

company_updates_collection.description:
Last night in London, we had the privilege of hosting an event as part of the "Create What You Wish Existed" series. It was an evening defined by quality, exclusivity, and the forward-looking vision of our guest speaker, Yuri Gurski.

Yuri, the CEO and Board Member at Palta and the Founder and President at Flo Health Inc., graced us with his presence and shared his insights. Palta, a multi-product technology company, boasts over 60 million monthly active users, and Flo Health Inc., their flagship product, is the #1 health app in the world, with over 300 million downloads.

During his talk, Yuri delved into the paradigm shift in the business landscape driven by AI and empathetic AI-driven products. He painted a picture of how these innovations will reshape productivity, health, and even dating in the coming years.

But what truly set this event apart was Yuri's emphasis on outliers - those who defy conventional success and operate at the extreme edges of possibility. He expressed a keen interest in those who possess exceptional intelligence and are ready to drive change in their respective fields.

Yuri also shed light on how Palta collaborates with and supports such outliers to lead the business shift trend in their domains. With more than a dozen new product ideas on the horizon, Palta's potential knows no bounds.

The evening was a gathering for individuals passionate about innovation, AI technology, and shaping the future. It featured a talk, a Q&A session, and networking opportunities with like-minded founders and tech professionals.

This event marked a milestone in our "Create What You Wish Existed" series, which has previously hosted founders like Sam Altman, Nik Storonsky, Michael Acton Smith, and more. The quest for knowledge and the drive to create a brighter future unite us all.

Thank you to everyone who joined us for this evening of learning and networking. Stay tuned for more events that push the boundaries of innovation!

#Innovation #AI #Tech #CreateWhatYouWishExisted #Palta #Yuri #Outliers #FutureShapers #Networking #LondonEvents #Flo

Meet Georgia Kampanelli, Legal Counsel at Palta, whom Gold Magazine recently interviewed.

🔵 She didn't initially envision herself working in a tech company. But her career journey has been one of embracing change and seizing new opportunities.

🔄 Switching Sectors: Georgia transitioned from a traditional law firm to the private banking sector before ultimately landing in the tech industry. This decision wasn't easy, but it was fueled by her attraction to innovation and entrepreneurial spirit.

🔮 Future-focused: Georgia is optimistic about the tech sector's future, especially after its resilience during challenging times. Being in-house counsel in tech is not just about legalities; it's about understanding the big picture and adapting to constant changes in business and global contexts.

🛠️ Skill Set: Beyond legal advice, in-house roles require project management skills and effective communication with various stakeholders—from management to marketing.

🤖 Tech-Savvy Legal Operations: At Palta, Georgia highlights the increasing role of generative AI tools and automated processes in legal operations. She advocates for lawyers to be educated in legal technology as the industry evolves.

🌍 Staying Informed: With the fast-paced nature of tech, Georgia stresses the importance of staying updated from trusted sources on both local and global scales.

🚀 "You can observe the next generation, but it is way more fascinating to be a part of it!" - Georgia Kampanelli

Read the full interview at https://bitly.ws/TFBZ

#LegalCounsel #CareerJourney #Innovation #ChangeManagement #LegalTech

Our FitTech Club podcast is finally live! 🔥

I met Tanya Parfenyuk 🇺🇦 in the new office of Zing Coach™ in Limassol, Cyprus, to speak about her personal story and vision of the industry. 

After leaving her home country, Belarus, Tanya had to start all over again. Today, her fitness training app Zing Coach™ reaches 500,000 users. As the stakes are getting higher, Tanya reflects on her past mistakes and learnings – and predicts where her future competitors will come from.

Tune in! 🎙️ https://lnkd.in/gjMrHhkh

#podcast #fittech #fitnesstech #founderstories

Our team at Simple App has been busy cooking a whole new product recipe with the most sought ingredient - #AI 
The result is SIMPLY outstanding. Meet 𝗔𝘃𝗼 🥑 an 𝗔𝗜-𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗰𝗵𝗮𝘁𝗯𝗼𝘁 🤖  that answers users’ questions in real-time, giving the information they need to keep moving toward their health and nutrition goals, right there in the Simple App.

💡  How to build lifestyle habits that enhance their well-being 
      “𝙃𝙚𝙮 𝘼𝙫𝙤, 𝙝𝙤𝙬 𝙘𝙖𝙣 𝙄 𝙗𝙚𝙩𝙩𝙚𝙧 𝙢𝙖𝙣𝙖𝙜𝙚 𝙢𝙮 𝙨𝙩𝙧𝙚𝙨𝙨?”
💡  How to stay motivated and stick to your goals
      “𝙃𝙚𝙮 𝘼𝙫𝙤, 𝙢𝙮 𝙢𝙤𝙩𝙞𝙫𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣 𝙞𝙨 𝙡𝙤𝙬 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙄 𝙙𝙤𝙣’𝙩 𝙛𝙚𝙚𝙡 𝙡𝙞𝙠𝙚 𝙚𝙭𝙚𝙧𝙘𝙞𝙨𝙞𝙣𝙜"

Avo is just another step, in Simple App's quest to make improved health accessible to all, and we can’t wait to see what's next.

Meet  Eyal Keren 👋
VP of User Acquisition at Palta. He joined our team exactly a year ago, coming from one of the world’s leading betting and gaming companies.

Read on to learn more about Eyal's first year with Palta 👇 and follow #lifeatpalta #teampalta for more employee stories.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗮𝘃𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗮𝗽𝗽?
Palta's mission to empower health, and well-being and create a global impact for good is something that strongly resonates with me. 
I also get to work with amazing people from all our portfolio companies, so I can't pick a favourite. I love all of Palta's apps equally 😉  

𝗗𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗽𝘀𝘆𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗯𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰𝘀 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗲?
Of course!
Being relatable, creating interest and suggesting a call to action are all things that might help any introvert.

𝗖𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗹𝗱?
There is a lot here, but three main ones are: 
✔  Balancing profitability and growth 
✔  AI integration in different aspects of UA 
✔ Evolving measurement to unlock new opportunities

𝗗𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗹𝘆? 
𝗪𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗮 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗶𝗳 𝘀𝗼 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝘆?
Yes! I am fully remote and relocated with my family to Portugal 🇵🇹 almost a year ago, so I would not only consider it but recommend it 💚 

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂’𝗱 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗣𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮?
I have a long list of goals but the main one would be creating a growth mindset that drives business impact in our companies.

#growth #healthtech #ai #portugal #useracquisition #vp #team #employeeengagement #tech #startup

Another epic update from the team at Simple App, who’ve been hard at work at the coalface of cutting-edge tech, designing an updated Food Tracker, a system that Scores their users’ meals’ nutrient value, AND an updated Home screen — talk about busy!
These new features will remove a lot of confusion and frustration from users’ lives — no more scratching their heads wondering if a meal was helpful or healthy for their goals. Now all they need to do is eat, log, and learn from the food feedback they get.
Logging food with SIMPLE is now easier and more intuitive. Instead of scrolling a food database, users can just type in what they ate, snap a photo of their meal, or describe it using their voice.
Once a user has logged their food, it’s analyzed by the Nutrition Scores system which the Simple App science team has infused with #nutrition knowledge and designed to reflect well-established nutrition guidelines. The user then gets a (judgment-free) Nutrition Score of Low, Fair, Good, or Optimal which shows the overall nutrition quality of their meal.
That’s a game-changer, right there 👏🏻:

Any time a user feels stuck on what to do next, one glance at their Simple Home screen will point them in the right direction of what to do today, and where they’re at with their overall day’s Nutrition Score and within their fasting schedule.
These outstanding new features are another brick in the wall of Simple App’s vision to make improved health accessible to all. Learn more about them here: 👇🏻
Nice work team!!


#ai #nutrition #objectives #healthylifestyle #productdevelopment #productdesign #userexperience #wellness
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
Our users wanted us to make our food tracking system better. So we listened and got to work. Incorporating AI into our already-smart #tech is changing the game for how we support our users, and we’re super excited to share some new features with you today!  

🍏🥐🍅 INTRODUCING … our new and improved Food Tracker 

Logging food with SIMPLE is now easier, more intuitive, and quick as a flash. Instead of scrolling a food database, users can just type in what they ate, snap a photo of their meal, or describe it using their voice. 

We’re stoked with this update. But what comes next is even BETTER. 

🟢🟠🟡 INTRODUCING … our new Nutrition Scores and food feedback 

Once a user has logged their food, it’s analyzed by our algorithm, which has been designed alongside our in-house science team to reflect well-established #nutrition guidelines. Each food is assessed in terms of nutritional factors that influence weight and health to give the user a Nutrition Score of Low, Fair, Good, or Optimal. This shows the overall nutritional quality of their meal. They can also see a daily Score, which is the average of all meal Scores logged that day. 

We designed Nutrition Scores based on our belief that no food is either “good” or “bad.” These Scores don’t judge our users or their food choices. They’re designed to guide — not guilt — them toward a healthier, more balanced diet over time, bringing their goals even more within reach. #nutritionmatters

📲 INTRODUCING … our redesigned Home screen that guides users on what to do today, saving them time, and confusion, and smoothing out the bumpy road of building new habits. 

Now when users tap open their app, they have these key features in one place: 
📲 the day’s average Nutrition Score and logged meals
📲 a button to log new meals (and edit previously logged meals)
📲 where they are in their eating or fasting window
📲 buttons to start or stop their fast or change their daily intermittent fasting schedule 

🥑 DON’T FORGET … Avo, our recently launched AI-powered nutrition chatbot

A final shout-out to Avo, who’s on hand 24/7 to answer your wellness questions! Avo’s now living its best life in the SIMPLE app, helping users zhuzh up their meals, feel more relaxed when stress-eating flares up, and stay motivated on their weight loss journey.

Launching these brand-new features in our SIMPLE app feels like Christmas Day: we can’t wait for our users’ to try them! We keep moving closer to our vision of making improved health accessible to all, working day by day on our mission of translating cutting-edge nutritional science and tech into simple, everyday solutions. 

The Food Tracker and Nutrition Scores are already available to all our English users, but the Home screen updates are currently only available in the English iOS version of the app. More languages (French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Spanish) and Android are coming soon! 

👉 https://lnkd.in/dCtF9UwP

company_updates_collection.description:
Last night in London, we had the privilege of hosting an event as part of the "Create What You Wish Existed" series. It was an evening defined by quality, exclusivity, and the forward-looking vision of our guest speaker, Yuri Gurski.

Yuri, the CEO and Board Member at Palta and the Founder and President at Flo Health Inc., graced us with his presence and shared his insights. Palta, a multi-product technology company, boasts over 60 million monthly active users, and Flo Health Inc., their flagship product, is the #1 health app in the world, with over 300 million downloads.

During his talk, Yuri delved into the paradigm shift in the business landscape driven by AI and empathetic AI-driven products. He painted a picture of how these innovations will reshape productivity, health, and even dating in the coming years.

But what truly set this event apart was Yuri's emphasis on outliers - those who defy conventional success and operate at the extreme edges of possibility. He expressed a keen interest in those who possess exceptional intelligence and are ready to drive change in their respective fields.

Yuri also shed light on how Palta collaborates with and supports such outliers to lead the business shift trend in their domains. With more than a dozen new product ideas on the horizon, Palta's potential knows no bounds.

The evening was a gathering for individuals passionate about innovation, AI technology, and shaping the future. It featured a talk, a Q&A session, and networking opportunities with like-minded founders and tech professionals.

This event marked a milestone in our "Create What You Wish Existed" series, which has previously hosted founders like Sam Altman, Nik Storonsky, Michael Acton Smith, and more. The quest for knowledge and the drive to create a brighter future unite us all.

Thank you to everyone who joined us for this evening of learning and networking. Stay tuned for more events that push the boundaries of innovation!

#Innovation #AI #Tech #CreateWhatYouWishExisted #Palta #Yuri #Outliers #FutureShapers #Networking #LondonEvents #Flo

Meet Georgia Kampanelli, Legal Counsel at Palta, whom Gold Magazine recently interviewed.

🔵 She didn't initially envision herself working in a tech company. But her career journey has been one of embracing change and seizing new opportunities.

🔄 Switching Sectors: Georgia transitioned from a traditional law firm to the private banking sector before ultimately landing in the tech industry. This decision wasn't easy, but it was fueled by her attraction to innovation and entrepreneurial spirit.

🔮 Future-focused: Georgia is optimistic about the tech sector's future, especially after its resilience during challenging times. Being in-house counsel in tech is not just about legalities; it's about understanding the big picture and adapting to constant changes in business and global contexts.

🛠️ Skill Set: Beyond legal advice, in-house roles require project management skills and effective communication with various stakeholders—from management to marketing.

🤖 Tech-Savvy Legal Operations: At Palta, Georgia highlights the increasing role of generative AI tools and automated processes in legal operations. She advocates for lawyers to be educated in legal technology as the industry evolves.

🌍 Staying Informed: With the fast-paced nature of tech, Georgia stresses the importance of staying updated from trusted sources on both local and global scales.

🚀 "You can observe the next generation, but it is way more fascinating to be a part of it!" - Georgia Kampanelli

Read the full interview at https://bitly.ws/TFBZ

#LegalCounsel #CareerJourney #Innovation #ChangeManagement #LegalTech

Come with us as we rub our crystal ball and explore 5 wellness trends for 2024, predicted by our Chief Nutrition Officer Ro Huntriss and the Science team at SIMPLE. Check out our blog for more. 

⚖️ 1. LOOKING BEYOND THE SCALE ⚖️ 
In 2024, it’s high time we put body weight and BMI into context and decentered weight loss as the main purpose of living a healthy lifestyle. We’re seeing restrictive diets wane in popularity, and a growing desire for sustainable habits that support our overall well-being. 

💜 Our 2024 prediction: 
We’ll embrace health as a multi-faceted mix of factors and move further away from chasing the scale number as if it’s the only thing that matters. As staunch members of #TeamSelfCare, we couldn’t be more excited by this shift. 

🌎 2. EATING FOR PLANET HEALTH 🌎
A recent research review found that ultra-processed foods (UPFs) contribute more than other food groups to greenhouse gas emissions and account for 36–45% of total diet-related biodiversity loss. It’s increasingly clear that eating in a more environmentally-sustainable way means eating more plants and fewer UPFS. 

💜 Our 2024 prediction: 
We’ll find new ways of creating healthy, environmentally sustainable diets.

🩸 3. EMBRACING PERIOD POSITIVITY 🩸 
Conversations around periods and menstrual health are becoming more mainstream, putting menstrual health firmly on the global agenda, and driving creative solutions in period products, clothing, and self-care.

💜 Our 2024 prediction: 
Empowering women, girls, and all those who menstruate to understand, openly discuss, and feel good about their bodies’ needs is something we wholeheartedly support, and we’re confident our colleagues over at the Flo app will be leading the charge! 

😌 4. SOOTHING STRESS WITH SELF-CARE 😌
With the pandemic only just in the rear view mirror; 2023’s heavy layoffs, job insecurity, and financial pressures; plus kickback from our constantly-connected digital lives, our mental health is under mounting pressure. 

In response, we’re taking more control. An Instagram survey found that one of Gen Z’s top priorities in 2024 is staying healthy, and the Global Wellness Institute saying we’re investing more money into self-care than ever.

💜 Our 2024 prediction: 
We’ll tackle our ever-growing list of stressors with increasing determination. 

🤖 5. HARNESSING AI FOR HEALTH 🤖 
By analyzing real-time data to optimize our experience, AI can help us have more satisfying and productive practices across many areas of health — meditation, fitness, nutrition, stress, sleep, etc. — without the hefty price tag often associated with 1-2-1 coaching. 

💜 Our 2024 prediction: 
We’ll see AI being used more for personalized support and coaching. At SIMPLE, we’ve got big plans for Avo, our wellness assistant! 

https://lnkd.in/dKqfHguf

Why we made Flo Premium completely free for 1bn women worldwide…

Back in October 2022, we announced that we’d be giving Flo Premium to women across 22 countries — including Ethiopia, Haiti, and Nepal — at no cost to them. 

Now, we’re expanding the Pass It On Project further to give the power of health literacy to more women living in countries where access to safe and credible health information is limited.

Flo’s mission is to build a better future for female health, but studies, surveys, and health outcomes show us that there's still a long way to go. While 70% of women in India report menstrual health issues, a concerning 82% of girls in Malawi reported having no knowledge of menstruation before their first period.

As of today:
📋1 billion women will now have access to Flo Premium completely free
🌍 44 new countries can now benefit, including India, Indonesia, and Nigeria
💝10 million+ women worldwide are using Flo Premium for free today

We look forward to a brighter future, one with better health and fertility outcomes for women worldwide.

To every existing paying Premium member — thank you. It’s because of you that we can make this global movement possible. 

For more information, visit: https://lnkd.in/dMKq38DP

Wow! What an experience it was in Dallas, Texas for Obesity Week! It was my first time at this conference and I have to say it’s one of the best conferences I’ve been to.

The perfect platform to share the story of the Simple App, the research we do and our grand ambitions, in addition to presenting our second conference abstract.

With travelling solo and not knowing many people at the conference, a special thanks must go to the Allurion Technologies team Paul Sacher (PhD) Jen Pain Bill Nadeau, MS, RD Jeff Feldgoise  for adopting me, entertaining me and introducing me to so many amazing people. 

I’ve got some digesting to do, thinking about how we can apply the many fascinating concepts discussed into the future development of Simple 💫 

Great to see / meet Giles Yeo Elanor Hinton Volkan Demirhan Yumuk Katie Ellison, MS, RDN, LDN Sean Wharton Diana Thomas M. Christopher Griffith, M.D. Camilla Easter Professor Hutan Ashrafian Terese Torstensson Caterina Conte and many more! 💫

🔵 She didn't initially envision herself working in a tech company. But her career journey has been one of embracing change and seizing new opportunities.

🔄 Switching Sectors: Georgia transitioned from a traditional law firm to the private banking sector before ultimately landing in the tech industry. This decision wasn't easy, but it was fueled by her attraction to innovation and entrepreneurial spirit.

🔮 Future-focused: Georgia is optimistic about the tech sector's future, especially after its resilience during challenging times. Being in-house counsel in tech is not just about legalities; it's about understanding the big picture and adapting to constant changes in business and global contexts.

🛠️ Skill Set: Beyond legal advice, in-house roles require project management skills and effective communication with various stakeholders—from management to marketing.

🤖 Tech-Savvy Legal Operations: At Palta, Georgia highlights the increasing role of generative AI tools and automated processes in legal operations. She advocates for lawyers to be educated in legal technology as the industry evolves.

🌍 Staying Informed: With the fast-paced nature of tech, Georgia stresses the importance of staying updated from trusted sources on both local and global scales.

🚀 "You can observe the next generation, but it is way more fascinating to be a part of it!" - Georgia Kampanelli

Read the full interview at https://bitly.ws/TFBZ

#LegalCounsel #CareerJourney #Innovation #ChangeManagement #LegalTech

Another epic update from the team at Simple App, who’ve been hard at work at the coalface of cutting-edge tech, designing an updated Food Tracker, a system that Scores their users’ meals’ nutrient value, AND an updated Home screen — talk about busy!
These new features will remove a lot of confusion and frustration from users’ lives — no more scratching their heads wondering if a meal was helpful or healthy for their goals. Now all they need to do is eat, log, and learn from the food feedback they get.
Logging food with SIMPLE is now easier and more intuitive. Instead of scrolling a food database, users can just type in what they ate, snap a photo of their meal, or describe it using their voice.
Once a user has logged their food, it’s analyzed by the Nutrition Scores system which the Simple App science team has infused with #nutrition knowledge and designed to reflect well-established nutrition guidelines. The user then gets a (judgment-free) Nutrition Score of Low, Fair, Good, or Optimal which shows the overall nutrition quality of their meal.
That’s a game-changer, right there 👏🏻:

Any time a user feels stuck on what to do next, one glance at their Simple Home screen will point them in the right direction of what to do today, and where they’re at with their overall day’s Nutrition Score and within their fasting schedule.
These outstanding new features are another brick in the wall of Simple App’s vision to make improved health accessible to all. Learn more about them here: 👇🏻
Nice work team!!


#ai #nutrition #objectives #healthylifestyle #productdevelopment #productdesign #userexperience #wellness
